name: Virtual PC 6 Machine Package
summary: Learn about .VPC6 files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Virtual PC 6 used VPC6 files to organize all components of a virtual machine into a single package for easier management and transfer. Each package contained the necessary resources for booting Windows and running Windows applications alongside Mac software.
NOTE: VPC6 files are similar to .VPC7 files.

instructions: You can open VPC6 files with Parallels Desktop for Mac and VMware Fusion. To open a VPC6 file with either program, select File â†’ Open. Microsoft Virtual PC 6 also supports VPC6 files, but the software is discontinued.
